core.data.machine.configuration

Class NetworkInterfaceData

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.data.AData
      • core.data.machine.configuration.NetworkInterfaceData

  • public class NetworkInterfaceData
extends AData
    Represents a network interface. Its internal data represents https://wiki.debian.org/NetworkConfiguration#iproute2_method which means we can allow our admins to have fine-grained control over their ifaces!

    • Constructor Detail

      • NetworkInterfaceData

        public NetworkInterfaceData()
        Create a NetworkInterfaceData containing null values. You should only use this constructor if you intend to call the read() method otherwise you're wasting electrons!
